entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -42.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
